de-DE.description:
Spiele mit deinen Freunden Blackjack mit Alexa! Du kannst mit bis zu 3 Freunden an einem Tisch gegen die Bank spielen. Wenn du willst, kannst du dabei Echo Buttons verwenden, um immer zu wissen, wer gerade an der Reihe ist. 

Die Bankroll jedes Spielers wird gespeichert. Auch wenn du mehrere Runden Blackjack spielst, kannst du deine Bankroll immer im Auge behalten. Bei jedem neuen Spiel lässt sich die Spielerzusammenstellung am Tisch ändern. 

Zu Beginn hast du 5000 Dollar zur Verfügung. Dein Einsatz kann zwischen 5 und 1000 Dollar liegen. 

Verbessere deine Blackjack Skills, in dem du vor deinen Zügen um Hinweise bittest ("Was soll ich tun?") oder indem du im Trainingsmodus spielst ("Trainingsmodus anschalten"), in dem Alexa dir vor jedem Zug sagt, was basierenden auf den aktuell angewandten Spielregeln die beste Taktik ist.  

Dieses umfangreiche Spiel bietet alle Spieloptionen -  Hit, Stand, Split, Double Down und Surrender.  Du kannst Optionen "ändern" und zum Beispiel die Anzahl von Decks bestimmen (1, 2, 4, 6, oder 8) oder festlegen, ob das Aufgeben erlaubt ist oder nicht.

Außerdem gibt es eine optionale Triple Seven Zusatzwette. Mit einem Einsatz von 5 Dollar gewinnst du bei der Zusatzwette, wenn deine erste Karte, deine ersten beiden Karten oder deine ersten drei Karten alle Siebenen sind. Hast du drei Siebenen? Dann hast du den Jackpot gewonnen, der mit jeder Zusatzwette wächst. Spiele mit deinen Freunden, um den Jackpot noch weiter ansteigen zu lassen. 

Du kannst jeder Zeit "Lies die Regeln vor" sagen, um die gerade angewandten Regeln zu hören. Oder bitte um eine "Wiederholung", wenn du deinen letzten Spielzug wiederholen willst. 

Wenn du das Spiel in den Originalzustand zurückversetzen und zu den Originalregeln wechseln willst, sage dann "Spiel zurücksetzen". 

Vergleiche deine Bankroll mit denen der anderen Spieler und sage "Lies die High Scores vor", um die aktuelle Rangliste zu hören. Wenn du immer weiterspielst, schaffst du es vielleicht an die Spitze! 

Hast du Feedback an uns oder wünscht dir für die Zukunft weitere Features? Kontaktier uns auf Facebook https://www.facebook.com/alexacasinogames!
examplePhrases: Alexa, lass Blackjack Party die Karten austeilen
de-DE.name: Blackjack Party
de-DE.summary: Spiele die Partyversion von Blackjack mit deinen Freunden! Nutze den Trainingsmodus, um Blackjack spielen zu lernen!

en-AU.description:
Play rounds of blackjack, tracking your bankroll as you play.  You start with 5,000 dollars in credit and can vary your bet from 5 to 1,000 dollars.  Improve your blackjack skills by asking for a suggestion on any hand ("what should I do") or use training mode ("enter training mode"), where Alexa will prompt you with the recommended play on every hand, based on the game options currently being used!  This full-featured game has it all - hit, stand, split, double down, and even surrender.  You can also "change" options such as the number of decks (1, 2, 4, 6, or 8) or whether surrender is allowed or not.

There is also a triple seven progressive side bet.  For a 5 dollar side bet, you win if your first, first two, or first three cards are sevens.  Got three sevens?  Then you win the progressive jackpot, which increases based on aggregate play of this skill!  Play with your friends and really watch that jackpot grow!

At any time, you can ask to "read the rules" or "repeat" to hear the current rules in play or to repeat your hand and bankroll.  If you need to reset the game to its original state and rules of play, say "reset game."

Compare your bankroll with other players by saying "read high scores" to hear the leader board. Keep playing and you can move to the top!

Have feedback or features you'd like to see?  Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/alexacasinogames!
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell blackjack game to deal
en-AU.name: Blackjack Game
en-AU.summary: Play a game of blackjack, including the ability to double, split, and surrender. Use training mode to learn as you play!

en-US.description:
Play blackjack with your friends on Alexa!  You and up to 3 friends can play against the dealer at the same table, optionally using Echo Buttons to keep track of each player's turn.  Each player's bankroll is saved and you can change the group of players from the table each time you play.  Play rounds of blackjack, tracking your bankroll as you play.  You start with 5,000 dollars in credit and can vary your bet from 5 to 1,000 dollars.  Improve your blackjack skills by asking for a suggestion on any hand ("what should I do") or use training mode ("enter training mode"), where Alexa will prompt you with the recommended play on every hand, based on the game options currently being used!  This full-featured game has it all - hit, stand, split, double down, and even surrender.  You can also "change" options such as the number of decks (1, 2, 4, 6, or 8) or whether surrender is allowed or not.

There is also a triple seven progressive side bet.  For a 5 dollar side bet, you win if your first, first two, or first three cards are sevens.  Got three sevens?  Then you win the progressive jackpot, which increases based on aggregate play of this skill!  Play with your friends and really watch that jackpot grow!

At any time, you can ask to "read the rules" or "repeat" to hear the current rules in play or to repeat your hand and bankroll.  If you need to reset the game to its original state and rules of play, say "reset game."

Compare your bankroll with other players by saying "read high scores" to hear the leader board. Keep playing and you can move to the top!

Have feedback or features you'd like to see?  Connect with us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/alexacasinogames!
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell blackjack party to deal
en-US.name: Blackjack Party
en-US.summary: Play blackjack with your friends in this party version of Blackjack! Use training mode to learn as you play!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Allows you to play a game of blackjack with varying options. The game keeps the player's state so they can track their progress as they play.  Linking the skill is optional but if done will read the player's first name when they start the skill or if they are on the leader board.
